name: braze-autocomplete-extension
description: Braze 타겟팅 속성 자동완성 Chrome Extension

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:background && npm run build:content && npm run build:product && npm run build:finalize
scripts.build:finalize: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ && mv dist/src/popup/index.html dist/popup.html 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist/src 2>/dev/null || true && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const html = fs.readFileSync('dist/popup.html', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/popup.html', html.replace(/src=\"\/(.+?)\"/g, 'src=\"./\$1\"').replace(/href=\"\/(.+?)\"/g, 'href=\"./\$1\"'));"
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../braze-autocomplete-extension.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' && cd .. && echo '✅ braze-autocomplete-extension.zip 생성 완료!'
